title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 160.4 - Immunity for Neutral Third Parties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 160.4 - Immunity for Neutral Third Parties

State Regulations

Neutral third parties conducting an ADR process to which
a dispute has been referred pursuant to this Part shall have such immunity from
liability as may be provided by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
160.4

Adopted
eff. 2/13/2024. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
